sub_title: Founder & Owner of Splendid Overseas Study Abroad Consulting
summary:
Accomplished leader with extensive experience in developing and implementing commercial strategies for new international startups.
I own and manage a successful company called Splendid Overseas based in the Netherlands. Our company specializes in providing a range of services including study abroad programs, career opportunities, a Greentech training program for the German industry, and various other offerings.
We have tie-ups with 300 plus top universities worldwide. We have partnered with Intra Overseas in New Delhi and Top Apostille Services provider in Mumbai, India, to offer top-notch services for mainly Indians aspiring to study or pursue an international career.

profile_positions.title: Business Owner

profile_positions.description:
In this recent role; I solely managed the maintenance and facilities department, security and manage the student housing department. I ensured smooth running of the organisation across the Netherlands. I ensured fulfilment of staff requirements. 

I interacted with students and provided them academic/non-academic guidance. I successfully designed complete housing contract and rental pricing for the entire housing department. I managed the student housing department along with an able team. 

I guided students through the process of arriving in the Netherlands, airport transfers, assistance with house allocations and contracts, appointments at IND and city halls. I planned and successfully rolled out the student database management system and updated information on Osiris.

Some of my notable achievements for this role are mentioned below

Efficiently designed the housing rental structure. Conducted negotiate and confirm contracts from service providers in areas of security, parking, cleaning, events, and Information Technology. 

Managed budgets and cost-effectiveness as well as ensured adherence to government regulations and environmental, health, and security standards. 

Proposed recommendations to organisation on various energy-saving and cost-effective methods. 

Effectively drafted reports and informed about relevant observations and made recommendations to the management team. 

Ensured the efficient running of the student houses with close co-ordination and provided regular training and guidance to the team. 

Generated reports from Osiris and the student housing database management system.
